channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Grayscale Bitcoin ETF decision could happen this week, pundits say
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The pending Grayscale ruling could impact the race for an approved spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund.

item.title: Immutable zkEVM begins testnet phase with 12 Web3 games in development
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Web3 gaming company announced that its fully Ethereum-compatible network is now available for public testing.

item.title: Commodity tokenization is the economic aid Africa needs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Emmanuel Asamoah
item.description: Commodity tokenization would enable African countries — such as Ghana and Botswana — an opportunity to empower themselves without relying on international aid.

item.title: Celsius customers to vote on settlement plan with Fahrenheit after judge gives okay
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The settlement was reached in July and, if the customers agree, it will go before the court for approval in October.

item.title: Kraken Ventures to raise $100M in second fund, with focus on ‘early stage founders’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The organization will also reserve a “significant portion” of the fund for follow-on investments and long-term entrepreneurial support.

item.title: Superseding indictment against Sam Bankman-Fried includes using $100M for campaign contributions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried allegedly used more than $100 million in user funds “in campaign contributions to Democrats and Republicans to seek to influence cryptocurrency regulation.”

item.title: SBF jailed, FTX partners under attack: Law Decoded
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried, the former CEO of the failed FTX crypto exchange, will be held in jail through the end of his two upcoming trials.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried will ‘return to his depression' without access to medication, say defense lawyers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Sam Bankman-Fried’s legal team, he was “only able to bring a small supply” of ADHD medication and antidepressants to jail following the judge revoking his bail.

item.title: Zimbabwe central bank close to introducing gold-backed digital tokens into retail
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Physical and digital gold tokens have been a big success as investments and an inflation hedge in Zimbabwe, which continues to face triple-digit inflation.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Bitcoin vs. gold: Are market cap and other comparisons actually relevant for investors?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin’s future price surge and mainstream adoption could happen independently of institutional adoption of the digital currency.

item.title: Price analysis 8/14: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: After weeks of low volatility, Bitcoin bulls are trying to make a comeback, but the rise in the U.S. Dollar Index may limit the upside recovery.

item.title: Bitcoin Frontier Fund launches accelerator program for Ordinals startups
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The program will provide seed money, mentoring and support to approved applicants.

item.title: Machi Big Brother withdraws defamation lawsuit against ZachXBT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Jeffrey Huang withdrew the lawsuit after ZachXBT edited his article that Huang claimed to be defamatory.

item.title: CoinDesk to lay off part of editorial staff in preparation for sale of stake: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Estimates of staffers facing the axe range from 45% (20 people) to 16%. A companywide meeting is reportedly scheduled for Aug. 14.

item.title: What is PayPal USD, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elizabeth Gail
item.description: PayPal has launched its own stablecoin, dubbed PayPal USD (PYUSD). The coin is only available to American customers.

item.title: Bitcoin teases new volatility as BTC price taps 4-day high near $29.6K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price movements edge higher as the Wall Street trading week begins, with Bitcoin building on a weekly close, which gave cause for cautious optimism.

item.title: How to identity fake cryptocurrency
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Learn essential cryptocurrency security practices to safeguard your digital assets. Explore crucial ways to protect your wallets, prevent hacks and ensure safe transactions.

item.title: Chinese man sentenced to 9 months in prison for buying $13K in USDT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: China has harshly enforced its crypto ban since the start of the year, cracking down on individuals and projects alike.

item.title: TeraWulf increases self-mined BTC in Q2, while Hut 8 looks to USBTC merger
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: U.S. miner TeraWulf expanded its Bitcoin mining capacity in 2023, resulting in 70% more BTC mined in Q2.

item.title: Coinbase VP says Canada can be a ‘global leader’ in crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase officially launched in Canada in August and is expanding its service offerings amid a promising local crypto climate.

item.title: Metaverse project The Sandbox unlocks $133M worth of tokens
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The next batch of token unlocks for The Sandbox is on Feb. 14, 2024, and will unfreeze over 200 million SAND for its team, company reserve and advisers.

item.title: Crypto adoption crosses party lines amid Washington’s political deadlock
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Support for crypto among United States politicians and voters appears to be crossing party lines with bipartisanship agreements.

item.title: FedNow showcases DLT-powered payments system as service provider
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The Federal Reserve wrote that it does not support or endorse any showcase providers featured on its website.

item.title: 13% of applications approved: British regulator discloses crypto registration stats
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Since January 2020, almost 300 crypto companies have applied for registration with the Financial Conduct Authority, 38 of which were approved.

item.title: Anthropic AI raises $100M from South Korea to bolster telecommunications industry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Google-backed AI developer Anthropic raised $100 million in funding from South Korean telecommunications giant SK Telecom to bolster the industry.

item.title: BTC price breakout by end of August? 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin stays frustratingly quiet after the weekly close, but BTC price forecasts are giving ever-shorter breakout deadlines.

item.title: PayPal to roll out Cryptocurrencies Hub for select users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The Cryptocurrencies Hub is key for PayPal to reinvent itself as a crypto-inclusive platform. The service will allow for the sale and purchase of cryptocurrencies, among other functionalities.

item.title: Bitcoin-friendly Javier Milei wins most votes in Argentina primary election
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Argentine presidential hopeful Javier Milei — a pro-Bitcoin, anti-central bank libertarian — has won a majority of the votes in a primary election.

item.title: Nifty News: Coca-Cola gets Based, Reddit avatars reach 20M milestone and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Coca-Cola has chosen the newly-launched Coinbase layer-2 network Base to deploy its Masterpiece NFT collection.
